sqlMap.select: select count(PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS.PROJECT_NO) from PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS ,PROJECT where PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS.PROJECT_NO = project.PROJECT_NO and project.PROJECT_ENDSTATUS ='Y' and PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS.DA =#mem_id# or PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS.AA =#mem_id# or PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS.pl =#mem_id# or PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS.TA=#mem_id# or PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS.ua =#mem_id#
select count(PORTFOLIO_NO) from PORTFOLIO, MEMBER where PORTFOLIO.MEM_ID =member.MEM_ID and member.MEM_ID= #mem_id#
